data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: They are aligned to the left
data.expected_result: They should be centered so they are well aligned vertically with other emojis
data.short_description: Emojis with non-square resolution (width smaller than height) are misaligned in Server Settings > Emojis
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings > Emojis - Upload an emoji that has a resolution with width smaller than height (e.g 80x128) - Observe emoji in the list
